Header: 517 prisoners pardoned parallel to the Independence Day
Content: President Gotabhaya Rajapaksa approved the release of 5 more prisoners in line with the 72nd National Independence Day. The released are members of the security forces and had been imprisoned for minor offenses. Accordingly, 517 prisoners have been pardoned parallel to the Independence Day. Meanwhile, Commander-in-Chief of the Russian Ground Forces, Army General Oleg Salyukov called on President Gotabhaya Rajapaksa at the Presidential Secretariat. He arrived in Sri Lanka as a special guest at the 72nd National Independence Day Celebrations. Oleg Salyukov also visited the Rock House Camp Modara of Sri Lanka Army.
